veral more proteins, the vesicle fuses with the lysosome and the
protein arrives at its destination.
During its travels our protein interacted with dozens of macromolecules
to achieve one purpose: its arrival in the lysosome. Virtually all components
of the transport system are necessary for the system to operate, and there-
fore the system is irreducible. And since all of the components of the system
are comprised of single or several molecules, there are no black boxes to in-
voke. The consequ
